For your stay during the Scalar Conference, we recommend the following hotels:

IBIS Stare Miasto

In the centre of the Old Town, the best location, only 15 minutes walk to the venue of the conference.

Price: Weekends: 180 PLN / single room & 210 PLN / double room Weekdays: 340 PLN / single room & 370 PLN / double room (8% VAT , breakfast and Internet included)

Email: h3714-re@accor.com

Promo Code: Scalar 2017 ( till 20.03 )

Radisson Blu Centrum Hotel

Very close to the conference venue, plenty of luxury for a very good price.

Address: ul. Grzybowska 24

Email: reservations.warsaw@radissonblu.com

Hotel Westin

Email: warsaw@westin.com

IBIS Warszawa Centrum

Very good location, close to the conference venue as well as places worth seeing in Warsaw.

Price: Weekends: 195 PLN / single room & 325 PLN / double room Weekdays: 325 PLN / single room & 355 PLN / double room (8% VAT, breakfast and Internet included)

Email: H2894-FO@accor.com

Promo Code: Scalar 2017 ( till 16.03 )
